data.title: Best Rated Mascaras That Hold a Curl in Sephora Malaysia
data.description: Discover the best rated mascaras that hold a curl in Sephora Malaysia. These mascaras are designed to give your lashes the perfect lift and volume, ensuring they stay curled all day long. Whether you're looking for lengthening, volumizing, or curling formulas, these top-rated mascaras have got you covered. Shop now and elevate your lash game with these must-have products from Sephora Malaysia.

advertiser.name: Sephora Malaysia
advertiser.description: Sephora is a visionary beauty e-retailer in the region, run by a dedicated and experienced affiliate program team. Affiliate marketing has proven to be a key driver, due to Sephora's ever-increasing amount of classic and emerging brands across a broad range of product categories including skincare, color, fragrance, body, smile care, and haircare, in addition to Sephora's own private label.

product.title: BENEFIT COSMETICS Roller Lash Mascara - Black
product.description: Its patent-pending Hook ‘n’ Roll™ brush features tiny custom-designed hooks to catch, lift and curl even short and straight lashes. Bye-bye eyelash curler!

product.title: RARE BEAUTY Perfect Strokes Universal Volumizing Mascara
product.description: This weightless, easy-to-build formula combined with its curvy, multi-length brush was specifically made to give every lash type (fine/sparse, full/thick, straight, curly) more lift, length, curl, and volume.

product.title: FENTY BEAUTY Hella Thicc Volumizing Mascara (Cuz I'M Black)
product.description: Hella big, hella bold, hella thick lashes that go beyond volume. The ultra-black formula creates full-bodied volume for an unreal dramatic lash effect. It’s sweat-, humidity- and transfer-resistant and features a tapered brush to coat, curl and lift your lashes.

product.title: ANASTASIA BEVERLY HILLS Lash Sculpt Lengthening & Volumizing Mascara
product.description: Anastasia Beverly Hills Lash Sculpt Lengthening & Volumizing Mascara delivers sexy, extension-effect lashes that curl with every coat. This ultimate formula sculpts and lengthens lashes for extreme volume. Stretch and sculpt from the root to the tip without flaking, clumping or smudging.

product.title: TARTE Tartelette™ Tubing - Mascara • Black
product.description: This micro-tubing tech innovation wraps each lash with flake-free tubes for a false lash effect that won't clump, flake or smudge. Nourishing shea butter, castor oil and carnauba wax help lashes reach their full growth potential. And it's easy to remove.

product.title: TARTE Lights, Camera, Lashes™ 4-in-1 Mascara
product.description: Add a little drama to the eyes with this mascara’s expertise to lengthen, curl, add volume and condition the lashes and make your eyes pop.
